description: Link images to articles as hero images or associate images with content

required_params.name: image_url
required_params.description: URL of image (from image_storage or external)

error_codes.ARTICLE_NOT_FOUND: I couldn't find that article to add the image to.
error_codes.INVALID_URL: That image URL doesn't seem valid. Please check it.
error_codes.LINK_FAILED: Something went wrong linking the image. Please try again.
error_codes.IMAGE_NOT_ACCESSIBLE: I can't access that image URL. Make sure it's publicly accessible.

usage_notes: Hero images are displayed prominently at top of article
Verify image URL is accessible before linking
Update article's hero_image_url field for hero images
For inline images (future): store in separate images array
Check image exists at URL before saving to article
Return updated article object after successful linking
Support both internal (from image_storage) and external URLs
